natural_affinity.name: Natural Affinity
natural_affinity.description: Gain a magical attribute of your choosing, permanently.

tiers.description: Gain 1 block each time you prepare an Illusion Magic counter.
Gain 2 block each time you prepare an Illusion Magic counter.
Gain 4 block each time you prepare an Illusion Magic counter.
When you discard due to a Disruption card effect, deal 2 damage to a random opposing unit for each card discarded.
When you discard due to a Disruption card effect, deal 2 damage to a random opposing unit, twice, for each card discarded.

sleight_of_hand.name: Sleight Of Hand
sleight_of_hand.description: Once per turn, if you have played an Illusion Magic card, draw a card when you run out of cards in your hand.

tiers.description: Your first Coercion card played each battle costs -1 Mana.
Your first Coercion card played each battle costs -2 Mana.
Your Disruption hexes last one additional turn.
Your Disruption hexes last two additional turns.
Two times per battle, gain 1 Mana when a non-minion unit is destroyed by a Reaping card effect.
Once per turn, gain 1 Mana when a non-minion unit is destroyed by a Reaping card effect.
Keep one minion alive between battles.
Keep two minions alive between battles.
Your critical hits from Fire Magic attacks apply Burning.
Your critical hits from Fire Magic attacks apply 2 stacks of Burning.
Your critical hits from Fire Magic attacks apply 3 stacks of Burning.
If you do not draw a Fire Magic attack when drawing a new hand during your End Phase, add a random Fire Magic attack from your deck to your hand.
If you draw one or zero Fire Magic attacks when drawing a new hand during your End Phase, add a random Fire Magic attack from your deck to your hand.
Healing from Waterbending effects also removes one stack of a random condition.
Healing from Waterbending effects also removes 2 stacks of a random condition.

fork_in_the_water.name: Fork in the Water
fork_in_the_water.description:
Select one of the following:

 When Waterbending boons cast by this unit expire, they restore 8% of the health of the unit upon which the boon was applied,
OR
Effects that deal ice damage deal 8% bonus damage.

choices.name: Rains of Charity
choices.description: When a Waterbending boon cast by this unit expires, restore 8% of the health of the unit upon which the boon was applied.

choices.name: Icehearted
choices.description: Effects that deal ice damage deal 8% bonus damage.

tiers.description: Your Air Channeling counters do 4% bonus damage per their position in the chain.
Your Air Channeling counters do 8% bonus damage per their position in the chain.
Your Air Channeling counters do 12% bonus damage per their position in the chain.
Gain 2 additional block every time you gain block from a Geomancy card.
Gain 4 additional block every time you gain block from a Geomancy card.
